validations.message: Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, and inline entry nodes are allowed
Only bold, italic, underline, and code marks are allowed

content.value: Hey all! Decided to reboot my personal site + blog and wanted to try something new and cucumber-some. I decided on Gatsby, Netlify, and Contentful - all new technologies for me to learn and use! Why did I decided on these? Let quickly jump into it!

, a dynamic static site generator that promises unparalleled speed and performance. I already fell in love with its React-based framework that combines with Graphql layer to fetch data. This empowers me to transform my design concepts into reality, ensuring a seamless user experience that captivates and delights.

robust plugin ecosystem also grants me the flexibility to integrate custom functionalities effortlessly, from interactive elements to rich media content. Whether I'm showcasing my portfolio, sharing personal anecdotes, or exploring niche interests, Gatsby serves as a nice springboard that allow me to flex my artistic values.
As I wanted to keep it simple and effective in my workflow,

emerges as the natural choice for hosting and deployment. Its seamless integration with Git repositories streamlines the development process, allowing me to focus on crafting content without worrying about the details of server management.

global CDN infrastructure ensures lightning-fast load times and reliable performance, regardless of geographical location. From automated continuous deployment to instant cache invalidation, Netlify empowers me to deliver a polished and responsive blogging experience that transcends boundaries and resonates with readers worldwide. And it hook up directly to my content found in Contentful and my git repo. And all this is continuous deployed using webhooks!
In the realm of content management, flexibility is paramount, and
emerges as an early winner. By embracing the headless

liberates me from the constraints of traditional templates and schemas, enabling me to structure and organize content with unparalleled freedom. It allows me to easily create and publish posts without having to worry about the finer details of CSS.

Contentful's intuitive interface and powerful API capabilities, I can effortlessly manage and update blog posts, articles, and multimedia content in real-time. I have always wanted to work with a CMS tool so Contentful seems like a great entry into it.

In conclusion, the decision to embrace Gatsby.js, Netlify, and Contentful for my personal blog is not merely a technical choiceâ€”it's also one that allows me to flex my innovative muscle. With these powerful tools by my side, I am confident in my ability to craft a blog that serves as a reflection of who I am and a beacon of inspiration for others on a similar journey. And will also serve as a springboard for the other ideas I have!
Even the smallest person can change the course of the future
